@looknorthBBC @discoverHullEY @Humberbeat Slight inaccuracy in the video...the Humber is indeed the busiest estuary in the country but with tens of thousands of shipping movements every year, not quite every day
@DazBCooper @SaviourMedical @abports21 @UKPILOTS Yes mate, was a bit of an eye opener in relation to piloting life, sure youll enjoy it! Hope youre settling in well, no doubt will bump into you soon!
Very sobering indeed https://t.co/b8yPNIaxVf
